biotools.summary: Ultra-fast automated docking program, designed to predict how small ligands bind to pharmacologically relevant macromolecules. The program employs a novel hybrid force field and a Monte Carlo protocol for the efficient sampling of conformational space.

bioschemas.name: GeauxDock
bioschemas.summary: Ultra-fast automated docking program, designed to predict how small ligands bind to pharmacologically relevant macromolecules. The program employs a novel hybrid force field and a Monte Carlo protocol for the efficient sampling of conformational space.
